column4: when i try to connect to irc servers set to join-on-startup i get these connection refused types of errors a lot, and am unable to connect, i was suggested to this channel, would anyone here be able to help with that by any chance?
anyone here have experience with connection refused errors with ubuntu? ;.;
i think you need to reword your question. Like what are you connecting to and whats the error.
connecting to irc servers, and the error being connection refused, including returning the refused error /after/ a connection
